first.name: Norna
first.content: ...Wyrd, how was I supossed to know that your hearing was THAT sensitive... If I'd known, I wouldn't have brought us to that death-metal concert last weekend!

1.name: Wyrd
1.content: Dude, don't worry about it... Life's not exactly easy being fused together like this.

2.name: Norna
2.content: Anyways, I wasn't aware of your needs...now that I know them, I'll accommodate you immediately.
